welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Swansea, where the charm of a quaint coastal town meets the excitement of a thriving city. From our beautiful beaches to our lively downtown area, we invite you to explore and experience all that Swansea has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a smaller terminal at T. F. Green Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Central Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
